QuestData.Title: A Time for Heroes
QuestData.Description: It's good to have you among us, $n. We've all heard of your past deeds.$B$BAs you know, King Wrynn is moving great armies into Northrend to meet those of Arthas. But armies are nothing without true heroes to inspire and lead them.$B$BI want you to be that hero for my men. Fight alongside them against the Scourge that lays siege to our stronghold.$B$BReport to Sergeant Hammerhill outside the inner hold. Valiance Keep cannot fall. The future of our campaign depends on it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Sergeant Hammerhill at Valiance Keep.
QuestData.RewardText: By Magni's beard! Looks like the heavy artillery's arriving.
